Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'v_LumCuryQuery' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].v_LumCuryQuery GO CREATE VIEW v_LumCuryQuery AS Select t.CompanyID,t.FromCuryID,t.CuryRateType,t.CuryMultDiv,t.CuryRate,t.RateReciprocal,t.ToCuryID,t.CuryEffDate,DATEADD(DAY, -1, ISNULL( ( select S.CuryEffDate from( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CompanyID, CuryRateType , FromCuryID, ToCuryID, CuryMultDiv ORDER BY CuryEffDate) row_num, CompanyID, FromCuryID, CuryRateType, CuryMultDiv, CuryRate, RateReciprocal, ToCuryID , CuryEffDate from CurrencyRate where CompanyID = t.CompanyID and CuryRateType = t.CuryRateType and FromCuryID = t.FromCuryID and ToCuryID = t.ToCuryID and CuryMultDiv = t.CuryMultDiv )S where S.row_num = t.row_num + 1 ),'9999/12/31')) AS EndCuryEffDate from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CompanyID, CuryRateType , FromCuryID, ToCuryID, CuryMultDiv ORDER BY CuryEffDate) row_num, CompanyID, FromCuryID, CuryRateType, CuryMultDiv, CuryRate, RateReciprocal, ToCuryID , CuryEffDate from CurrencyRate ) t
